price: 15. y el Día de la Resurrección, una barrera les impedirá ver a su Señor.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
